```{=html}
<!-- ESTILOS ESPECÍFICOS PARA OS CARDS DE CERTIFICAÇÃO -->
<style>
    .cert-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr));
        gap: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
    }

    .cert-card {
        background-color: #fff;
        border: 1px solid #e9ecef;
        border-radius: 12px;
        padding: 1.5rem;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: space-between;
        height: 100%;
        position: relative;
    }

    .cert-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px);
        box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        border-color: var(--primary-color);
    }

    .cert-icon {
        font-size: 2rem;
        color: var(--primary-color);
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        opacity: 0.8;
    }

    .cert-title {
        font-size: 1rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: #333;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        line-height: 1.4;
    }

    .cert-meta {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        color: #6c757d;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
    }

    .cert-link {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--accent-color);
        text-decoration: none;
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 5px;
    }

    .cert-link:hover {
        text-decoration: underline;
        color: #305775;
    }
    
    /* Estilo especial para o Card de Prêmio */
    .award-card {
        background: linear-gradient(to right, #f8f9fa, #fff);
        border-left: 5px solid var(--primary-color);
        border-radius: 8px;
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 3rem;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.02);
    }
</style>
```
